basic_rock.Name: Rock
basic_rock.Description: A basic rock. Win: 9 damage. Draw: 6 damage. Loss: 3 damage.

basic_paper.Name: Paper
basic_paper.Description: A basic paper. Win: 9 damage. Draw: 6 damage. Loss: 3 damage.

basic_scissors.Name: Scissors
basic_scissors.Description: Basic scissors. Win: 9 damage. Draw: 6 damage. Loss: 3 damage.

super_scissors.Name: Super Scissors
super_scissors.Description: Deals 5 damage for each Scissors attribute you have equipped.

safety_scissors.Name: Safety Scissors
safety_scissors.Description: Win: 9 damage, 4 block. Draw: 6 damage, 3 block. Loss: 3 damage, 2 block.

stone_shield.Name: Stone Shield
stone_shield.Description: Win: 8 damage, 6 block. Draw: 5 damage, 4 block. Loss: 3 damage, 2 block.

vampire_scissors.Name: Vampire Scissors
vampire_scissors.Description: Win: 12 damage, heals 50% of damage dealt. Draw: 8 damage. Loss: 4 damage.

iron_ball.Name: Iron Ball
iron_ball.Description: A heavy iron ball. Win: 14 damage. Draw: 9 damage. Loss: 5 damage. Has double Rock synergy.

origami.Name: Origami
origami.Description: Folded paper art. Win: 15 damage. Draw: 10 damage. Loss: 5 damage. Has both Paper and Scissors synergy.

shale.Name: Shale
shale.Description: Fragile rock. Always loses but takes variable damage. Transforms to Shale Shards on hit.

shale_shards.Name: Shale Shards
shale_shards.Description: Broken shale fragments. Beats paper and scissors, loses to rock. Deals 2x damage.

uranium.Name: Uranium
uranium.Description: Radioactive rock. Applies 1 radioactive counter to enemy (deals damage each turn).

grievances_letter.Name: Grievances Letter
grievances_letter.Description: Stores damage taken when you lose. Releases all stored damage on your next win.
